rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall featuring a north-facing glass facade for natural light with floor-to-ceiling windows that align with Vastu principles.

A dedicated dining area near the living room for enhanced functionality and natural lighting, ensuring harmonious spatial arrangement as per Vastu guidelines.
The modern kitchen is designed with ergonomic workflows. It includes floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side for ventilation and compliance with local building norms.
A compact yet functional space designed for servants. It maintains privacy and convenience while ensuring adherence to local architectural standards.
